<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#TableOfContents" title="Click to go to Table of Contents">Table of Contents</a></font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXPLANATORY NOTE</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This amendment to the Quarterly Report on Form&nbsp;10-Q for the quarter ended May&nbsp;4, 2013 (Amendment No.&nbsp;1) is being filed solely to provide a revised copy of Exhibit&nbsp;(10)X to restore certain information that was previously omitted from Exhibit&nbsp;(10)X pursuant to a request for confidential treatment. All other items of the Quarterly Report on Form&nbsp;10-Q for the quarterly period ended May&nbsp;4, 2013 (the May&nbsp;4, 2013 Form&nbsp;10-Q) are unaffected by the change described above and have been omitted from this Amendment No.&nbsp;1.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">PART&nbsp;II. OTHER INFORMATION</font></b><a name="Partii_OtherInformation_013758"></a></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 6.&#160; Exhibits</font></b><a name="Item6_Exhibits_013759"></a></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Exhibit&nbsp;index listed under Item&nbsp;6 of Part&nbsp;II of the May&nbsp;4, 2013 Form&nbsp;10-Q is hereby amended such that Exhibit&nbsp;(10)X is replaced in its entirety by the document attached as an exhibit to this Amendment No.&nbsp;1, which is hereby included as an exhibit to the May&nbsp;4, 2013 Form&nbsp;10-Q.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">SIGNATURE</font></b><a name="Signature_013800"></a></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:justify;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned thereunto duly authorized.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.48%;">

<tr>
<td width="14%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:14.92%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;17.5.</font></p>    </td>
<td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.48%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subcontracting</font></p>    </td>
<td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.6%;">

<td width="14%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:14.92%;">

<td width="79%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:79.48%;">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Credit Card Program Agreement is made as of the 22</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">nd</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;day of October, 2012 (&#147;<u>Effective Date</u>&#148;), by and among TARGET CORPORATION, a Minnesota corporation with its principal offices at Minneapolis, Minnesota, TARGET ENTERPRISE,&nbsp;INC., a Minnesota corporation with its principal offices at Minneapolis, Minnesota (collectively, &#147;<u>Company</u>&#148;), and TD BANK USA, N.A. (&#147;<u>Bank</u>&#148;), a national banking association with its principal offices as of the date hereof at Portland, Maine.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">W I T N E S S E T H</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">:</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, Bank has established programs to extend credit via private label and co-branded credit cards to qualified customers for the purchase of goods and services;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, concurrently with the execution of this Agreement, Target National Bank and Target Receivables LLC (collectively, &#147;<u>Sellers</u>&#148;), Target Corporation, and Bank are entering into a purchase and sale agreement (the &#147;<u>Purchase Agreement</u>&#148;) pursuant to which Bank shall (a)&nbsp;purchase from Sellers the co-branded and private label consumer credit card accounts and other assets related to the Company co-branded and private label consumer credit card program; and (b)&nbsp;assume from Sellers certain liabilities related to the Company co-branded and private label consumer credit card program, as designated in the Purchase Agreement;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the parties agree that the goodwill associated with the &#147;<u>Target</u>&#148; mark contemplated for use hereunder is of substantial value which is dependent upon the maintenance of high quality services and appropriate use of the mark pursuant to this Agreement;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, Company and Bank agree to establish the Program as provided herein; and</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, simultaneously with the execution hereof, and in consideration for Company&#146;s willingness to enter into this Agreement, The Toronto-Dominion Bank (the &#147;<u>Bank Guarantor</u>&#148;), has executed and delivered to Target Corporation a guaranty (the &#147;<u>Guaranty</u>&#148;) pursuant to which the Bank Guarantor has guaranteed, in full, the obligations and performance of Bank under this Agreement and the Purchase Agreement;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the terms, conditions and mutual covenants contained herein, and for good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, Company and Bank agree as follows:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;I</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">DEFINITIONS</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Generally.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following terms shall have the following meanings when used in this Agreement; capitalized terms that are not defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Purchase Agreement:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6<a name="PB_6_173800_7056"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Account</u>&#148; means a Private Label Account or Co-Branded Account as set forth in this Agreement and includes any Purchased Account; the term &#147;<u>Accounts</u>&#148; means Private Label Accounts and Co-Branded Accounts collectively.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Account Documentation</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Account, any and all documentation relating to that Account, including all Credit Card Applications, Credit Card Agreements, Credit Cards, Program Privacy Notices, Billing Statements, checks or other forms of payment, electronic payment authorization agreements,&#160; credit bureau reports, adverse action notices, change in terms notices, other notices, correspondence, memoranda, documents, stubs, instruments, certificates, agreements, magnetic tapes, disks, hard copy formats or other computer-readable data transmissions, microfilm, electronic or other copy of any of the foregoing, and any other written, electronic or other records or materials of whatever form or nature, including information relating or pertaining to any of the foregoing to the extent related to the Program; provided, however, that Account Documentation shall not include Company register tapes, invoices, sales or shipping slips, delivery and other receipts or other indicia of the sale of Goods and/or Services.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Account Terms</u>&#148; means the New Account Terms or Purchased Account Terms, as applicable, as such may be amended from time to time in accordance with this Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Acquired Retailer Portfolio</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;12.1(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Active Account</u>&#148; means, in any monthly billing cycle, an Account, other than a Written-Off Account, which carried a balance or had some purchase, cash advance or payment activity in that monthly billing cycle.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Affiliate</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, each Person that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with, such Person, except that for the purposes of ARTICLE&nbsp;VI, &#147;Affiliate&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in 12 CFR 40.3(a).&#160; For purposes of this definition, &#147;<u>control</u>&#148; of a Person means the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct or cause the direction of its management or policies, whether through the ownership of voting securities, by contract or otherwise.&#160; Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, neither TD Ameritrade Holding Corporation nor any subsidiary of TD Ameritrade Holding Corporation shall be considered an Affiliate of Bank (or an Affiliate of any Affiliate of Bank) for purposes of this Agreement, and each shall be treated as a third party in all respects.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Aggregate Cumulative Costs</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;8.3(d).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:39.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Agreement</u>&#148; means this Credit Card Program Agreement, together with all of its schedules and exhibits and, if modified, altered, supplemented, amended and/or restated, as the same may be so modified, altered, supplemented, amended and/or restated from time to time.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Alternative Risk-Adjusted Revenue</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in <u>Schedule 8.1</u>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>American Express</u>&#148; means American Express Company and its Affiliates, successors and assigns.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Applicable Law</u>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;all federal, state and local laws (including common law), statutes, rules, regulations; (ii)&nbsp;written regulatory guidance, written substantive recommendations, directives, written opinions and interpretations, policies and guidelines of any Governmental Authority; (iii)&nbsp;rulings, injunctions, judgments and orders of any Governmental Authority, and the final outcome of any binding arbitration; and (iv)&nbsp;any written or oral guidance or instructions to a party from a Governmental Authority with jurisdiction over such party,&#160; in each case applicable to the Program, the Accounts, or Bank or Company or their respective Affiliates or assets.&#160; Without limiting the foregoing, following the Closing Date, Bank may exercise its rights and obligations hereunder with respect to Applicable Law in response to the enactment by any Governmental Authority of a change of any of the items referred to in clauses (i)&nbsp;through (iii)&nbsp;that has not yet become effective, but only to the extent that Bank&#146;s actions are (A)&nbsp;taken based on the good faith determination of Bank that such actions are advisable in order to achieve compliance by the expected effective date and (B)&nbsp;being applied consistently to the Bank&#146;s and its U.S. Affiliates&#146; private label or co-branded (as the case may be) credit card portfolios.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Applicant</u>&#148; means an individual who has submitted a Credit Card Application for a Credit Card under the Program.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>ASC 860</u>&#148; means FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) Topic 860 (formerly Statement of Financial Accounting Standards (FAS) 140 and 166).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assigned Interests</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;17.3.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Auditor</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;4.15(c).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the preamble.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank Guarantor</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the recitals and includes any successor guarantor under the Guaranty.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank Event of Default</u>&#148; means the occurrence of any one of the events listed in Section&nbsp;13.1 with respect to Bank, or listed in Section&nbsp;13.2</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank Executive</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.3.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank Indemnified Parties</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;16.1</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank Interim Servicing Period</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;15.1(c).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank Licensed Marks</u>&#148; means the trademarks, tradenames, service marks, logos and other proprietary designations of Bank listed on <u>Schedule A</u> as may be modified from time to time in accordance with Section&nbsp;9.2(b), together with the tradename of Bank and any successor trademarks, tradenames, service marks, logos and proprietary designations that Bank adopts as successors to those listed on <u>Schedule A</u>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank Material Adverse Effect</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;10.2(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank Matters</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.5(d).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bank New Mark</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;9.2(b).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bankruptcy Code</u>&#148; means Title 11 of the United States Code, as amended, or any other applicable state or federal bankruptcy, insolvency, moratorium or other similar law, and all laws relating thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Billing Cycle</u>&#148; means the interval of time between regular periodic Billing Dates for an Account.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Billing Date</u>&#148; means, for any Account, the last day of each regular period when the Account is billed.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Billing Statement</u>&#148; means a summary of Account credit and debit transactions for a Billing Cycle, including a statement with only past-due account information, and any other statement subject to Section&nbsp;226.7, Title 12, Code of Federal Regulations, whether in print or electronic form.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>BIN</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;2.8(c).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Business Day</u>&#148; means any day, other than a Saturday, Sunday or legal holiday, on which Company and Bank both are open for business.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Cardholder</u>&#148; means any individual who is contractually obligated under a Credit Card Agreement; an authorized user of an Account shall be treated as a Cardholder (i)&nbsp;to the extent provided in the Cardholder Service practices, (ii)&nbsp;to the extent cardholder rights are extended to authorized users under Applicable Law, and (iii)&nbsp;as mutually agreed by the parties.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Cardholder Data</u>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;all Cardholder Lists and (ii)&nbsp;all personally identifiable information about a Cardholder or Applicant received by or on behalf of Bank (including by Company as servicer) in connection with the Cardholder&#146;s application for or use of a Credit Card or Account or otherwise obtained by or on behalf of Bank (including by Company as servicer), including all transaction and experience information collected by or on behalf of Bank (including by Company as servicer) with regard to each purchase charged by a Cardholder using his or her Credit Card.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Cardholder Indebtedness</u>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;all amounts owing by Cardholders with respect to Accounts, including outstanding loans, cash advances and other extensions of credit, finance charges (including accrued interest), late payment fees, and any other fees, charges and interest on the Accounts, in each case, whether or not posted and whether or not billed; less (b)&nbsp;any credit balances owed to Cardholders, any credits associated with returns,&#160; and any similar credits or adjustments with respect to the Accounts, in each case whether or not posted and whether or not billed.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Cardholder List</u>&#148; means any list (whether in hardcopy, magnetic tape, electronic or other form) that identifies or provides a means of differentiating Cardholders, including any such</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9<a name="PB_9_173854_2897"></a></font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-03.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 17:49 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">listing that includes the names, addresses, email addresses (as available), telephone numbers or social security numbers of any or all Cardholders.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Cardholder Service</u></font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#148; means the activities of Company as servicer undertaken pursuant to this Program that involve interacting with Cardholders and Applicants with respect to the Program, including the services performed by Company pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.1 and Section&nbsp;4.</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12, but excluding interactions with Cardholders and Applicants in Company&#146;s role as a retailer.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:39.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Change in Applicable Law</u>&#148; means, to the extent occurring after the Effective Date, (a)&nbsp;the enactment or promulgation of a new or modification of an existing provision of Applicable Law; or (b)&nbsp;a decision, order, decree, ruling or opinion of a Governmental Authority containing an interpretation of a provision of Applicable Law, but only to the extent that a party is advised by its counsel that such decision, order, decree, ruling or opinion is binding on or applicable to the Program, Bank or Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Charge Transaction Data</u>&#148; means the transaction information required to authorize, process and settle each purchase of Goods and/or Services charged to an Account and each return of such Goods and/or Services or other adjustment for credit to an Account.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Clean Up Call Option</u>&#148; means Company&#146;s option to purchase the Existing Receivables if (i)&nbsp;the outstanding balance of Existing Receivables on the Program Purchase Date or other purchase date agreed upon by the parties, as applicable, is [*] percent ([*]%) or less of the outstanding balance of Existing Receivables on the Closing Date, and (ii)&nbsp;Company&#146;s cost of servicing the Existing Receivables, assuming Company does not purchase the remainder of the Program Assets, is or is expected to be greater than Company&#146;s servicing revenue for the Existing Receivables.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Closing Date</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Purchase Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Co-Branded Account</u>&#148; means an open-end consumer credit account subject to the Program that settles through the Network and may be used where Network credit cards are accepted.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Co-Branded Credit Card</u>&#148; means a consumer credit card that bears a Company Licensed Mark and the trademarks, tradenames, service marks, logos or other proprietary designations of the Network and that may be used to access a Co-Branded Account.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Collections Manager</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;4.9(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Collections Policies</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;4.9(b)</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the preamble.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Channels</u>&#148; means all Stores owned or operated by Company or its Affiliates in the United States (including Licensee departments therein to the extent contractually permitted) and all other retail establishments or retail sales channels directed to United States consumers that are owned or operated by Company or its Affiliates or their Licensees and are branded with a Company Licensed Mark or a mark including the Company name, or are otherwise designated</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">as a Company Channel by mutual agreement of the Parties, including mail order, catalog and Internet outlets (including websites operated by Company or its Affiliates).</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Core Systems</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;4.19(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Event of Default</u>&#148; means the occurrence of any one of the events listed in Section&nbsp;13.1 with respect to Company, or listed in Section&nbsp;13.3.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Executive</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.3(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Guest</u>&#148; means any Person who makes purchases of Goods and/or Services.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Guest Data</u>&#148; means all personally identifiable information regarding a Company Guest that is obtained by Company (other than solely in its capacity as servicer) in connection with the Company Guest making a purchase of Goods and/or Services, including all transaction, experience and purchase information collected by Company (other than in its capacity as servicer) with regard to each purchase of Goods and/or Services made by a Company Guest, including the item-specific transaction information collected about Cardholders in connection with any such purchase of Goods and/or Services.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Indemnified Parties</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;16.2.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Interim Servicing Period</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;15.3(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Licensed Marks</u>&#148; means the trademarks, tradenames, service marks, logos and other proprietary designations of Company or its Affiliates listed on <u>Schedule B</u> as may be modified from time to time in accordance with Section&nbsp;9.1(b), together with the tradename of Company and any successor trademarks, tradenames, service marks, logos and proprietary designations that Company adopts as successors to those listed on <u>Schedule B</u>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Material Adverse Effect</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;10.1(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Matters</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.5(c).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:40.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company New Mark</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;9.1(b).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Company Transaction</u>&#148; means any purchase or return of Goods and/or Services through a Company Channel, including from a Licensee, using an Account.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Comparable Credit Card Segments</u>&#148; means, with respect to any portion of the Accounts, other private label credit card accounts, on the one hand, or co-branded or general purpose credit card accounts, on the other hand, as the case may be, that are owned, operated, serviced or managed by Bank or its U.S. Affiliates, and the cardholders of which are in the comparable credit risk score band and reside in the same geographical region.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Competing Retailer</u>&#148; means each of the entities identified on <u>Schedule 3.7(a)</u>, as amended from time to time by mutual agreement, and each of their Affiliates, and any successor to any such entity or its Affiliates.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Compliance Manager</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;4.6(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Compliance Practices</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.6(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Conversion</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;15.3(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Confidential Information</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;11.1(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Credit Card</u>&#148; means a Private Label Credit Card and/or Co-Branded Credit Card, as applicable; the term &#147;<u>Credit Cards</u>&#148; means Private Label Credit Cards and Co-Branded Credit Cards collectively.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Credit Card Agreement</u>&#148; means each credit card agreement between Bank and a Cardholder governing the use of an Account, including credit card agreements assigned to Bank pursuant to the Purchase Agreement, together with any amendments, modifications or supplements which now or hereafter may be made to such credit card agreement (and any replacement of such agreement).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Credit Card Application</u>&#148; means the credit application which must be completed and submitted by individuals who wish to become Cardholders.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Disclosing Party</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;11.1(d).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Disclosure Schedule</u>&#148; means, with respect to Company or Bank, a schedule delivered to the other party on or before the date of the Purchase Agreement setting forth, among other things, items the disclosure of which is required under the Purchase Agreement either in response to an express disclosure requirement contained in a provision of the Purchase Agreement or as an exception to one or more of the representations or covenants contained in the Purchase Agreement; provided, that the mere inclusion of an item in a Disclosure Schedule as an exception to a representation will not be considered an admission by the disclosing party that such item (or any non-disclosed item or information of comparable or greater significance) represents a material exception or fact, event or circumstance or that such item has had, or is reasonably expected to result in, a Company Material Adverse Effect or a Bank Material Adverse Effect.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Discover</u>&#148; means Discover Financial Services and its Affiliates, successors and assigns.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Dispute</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.5(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>DJ Action</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;9.3(e).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Effective Date</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the preamble.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Enhancement Product</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;5.4.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission</font></i></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-03.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 17:49 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Excess Cost Condition</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;8.3(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Excess Cost</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;8.3(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Existing Receivables</u>&#148; means as of any day, the Gross Receivables purchased by Bank on the Closing Date pursuant to the Purchase Agreement that remain outstanding.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Federal Funds Rate</u>&#148; means the offered rate as reported in The Wall Street Journal in the &#147;Money Rates&#148; Section&nbsp;for reserves traded among commercial banks for overnight use in amounts of one million dollars or more, as published in the most recent Friday edition prior to any required payment or settlement date in which such offered rate is reported, and if such rate is not so reported in any Friday edition of The Wall Street Journal during the thirty day period preceding such required payment or settlement date, such offered rate as reported in another publication reasonably acceptable to the parties.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Force Majeure Event</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;17.17.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>GAAP</u>&#148; means accounting principles generally accepted in the United States, consistently applied.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:39.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Goods and/or Services</u>&#148; means the products and services, including financial products and services, sold by or through Company Channels, including delivery services, shipping and handling, and work or labor to be performed for the benefit of Company Guests through the Company Channels.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Governmental Authority</u>&#148; means any federal, state or local domestic, foreign or supranational governmental or regulatory authority, agency, court, tribunal, commission or other governmental or regulatory entity of applicable jurisdiction, including the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, the OCC, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection and the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (Canada).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Gross Receivables</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Purchase Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Guaranty</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the preamble.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:39.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Incidental Company Channels</u>&#148; means Company Channels, including Stores, which are secondary or supplemental to Company&#146;s primary general merchandise retail strategy, including (i)&nbsp;physical locations in existence for a period of less than six months (e.g., a temporary or &#147;pop-up&#148; store); (ii)&nbsp;supplemental retail outlets that are not connected to Company&#146;s primary authorization and settlement system (e.g. Licensee- or third-party-operated websites, Licensee-operated departments within Stores); (iii)&nbsp;Company retail strategies that are other than general merchandise (e.g. Target Commercial Interiors); and (iv)&nbsp;limited-time, limited-scope, or pilot retail strategies in which Company may participate from time to time.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Indemnified Party</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;16.3(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Indemnifying Party</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;16.3(a).</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission</font></i></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Independent Appraiser</u>&#148; means a nationally recognized investment banking firm, valuation firm or firm of independent certified public accountants of recognized standing that is experienced in the business of appraising credit card businesses or receivables, and that is not an Affiliate of Company or Bank, as applicable, and that is not either party&#146;s principal auditor.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Initial Term</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;14.1.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Inserts</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;5.3(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:39.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>In-Store Payment</u>&#148; means any payment on an Account made in a Store by a Cardholder or a person acting on behalf of a Cardholder.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Intellectual Property</u>&#148; means, on a worldwide basis, other than with respect to Company Licensed Marks, Bank Licensed Marks, Cardholder Data and Company Guest Data, any and all: (i)&nbsp;rights associated with works of authorship, including copyrights, moral rights and mask-works; (ii)&nbsp;trademarks and service marks and the goodwill associated therewith; (iii)&nbsp;trade secret rights; (iv)&nbsp;patents, designs, algorithms and other industrial property rights; (v)&nbsp;other intellectual and industrial property rights of every kind and nature, however designated, whether arising by operation of law, contract, license or otherwise; and (vi)&nbsp;applications, registrations, renewals, extensions, continuations, divisions or reissues thereof now or hereafter in force (including any rights in any of the foregoing).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Interim Servicing Period</u>&#148; means the Company Interim Servicing Period or the Bank Interim Servicing Period, as applicable.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:39.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Joint IP</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;9.3(c).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Key Employees</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;2.7.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Key Program Management Resources</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.2(b).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Knowledge</u>&#148; means, with respect to either Company or Bank, the actual knowledge of (i)&nbsp;such party&#146;s Program Executive, (ii)&nbsp;the General Counsel or Chief Financial Officer of any entity comprising such party, (iii)&nbsp;in the case of Company, the General Counsel of Company&#146;s Financial and Retail Services division and (iv)&nbsp;in the case of Bank, the General Counsel of Bank Guarantor, in each case after due inquiry.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Launch Plan</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;2.1(b).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>LIBOR</u>&#148; means the rate for deposits in United States dollars for a one-month period which appears on Reuters Screen LIBOR01 Page&nbsp;or on such comparable system as is customarily used to quote LIBOR as of 11:00&nbsp;a.m., London time.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Losses</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;16.1.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Licensee(s)</u>&#148; means any Person(s)&nbsp;authorized by Company or any of its Affiliates to operate in and sell Goods and/or Services from Company Channels or under the Company Licensed Marks.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>

<div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>LOC</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section 13.4(b).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>MasterCard</u>&#148; means MasterCard Incorporated and its Affiliates, successors and assigns.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Network</u>&#148; means Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, and their respective payment systems, or any other mutually agreed upon payment system and payment system operator, as determined in accordance with Section 2.8, supporting the authorization, clearing and settlement of transactions in which Co-Branded Cards are tendered in payment.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Network Fees</u>&#148; means any membership, transaction or other fees, assessments or charges that at any time are imposed by the Network on Bank as issuer of the Credit Cards.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Network Rules</u>&#148; means the bylaws, procedures, rules and regulations of the Network, as applicable to the Program.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Network Transaction</u>&#148; means a purchase, return, cash advance, or other form of transaction using a Co-Branded Account other than in a Company Channel.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>New Account Terms</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section 2.3(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Nominated Purchaser</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section 15.2(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Non-Personally Identifiable Information</u>&#148; means Information that does not identify a consumer, such as aggregate information or blind data that does not contain personal identifiers such as account numbers, names, or addresses.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>OCC</u>&#148; means the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Opt-Out Party</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section 9.3(e)(ii).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Other Party</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section 4.15(c).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards</u>&#148; means the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards maintained by the PCI Security Standards Council, LLC, or any successor organization or entity.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Payment Channel</u>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section 4.8(b).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Person</u>&#148; means and includes any individual, partnership, joint venture, corporation, company, bank, trust, unincorporated organization, or any Governmental Authority.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Previously Disclosed</u>&#148; means, with respect to Company or Bank, information set forth in a Disclosure Schedule, whether in response to an express informational requirement or as an exception to one or more representations or covenants.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Private Label Account</u>&#148; means an open-end consumer credit account subject to the Program that settles directly between Company and Bank and may be used only in Company Channels.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15<a name="PB_15_174224_7091"></a></font></p>
