<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">respect to the implementation of such change, including hardware, software, telecommunications and personnel costs associated with any new interface, interface modification, interface enhancement or interface termination.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE V</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">MARKETING OF THE PROGRAM</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section 5.1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company Responsibility to Market the Program.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company shall be responsible for marketing the Program and shall, using its reasonable discretion, actively market the Program to promote its growth and viability.&#160; Company shall make all marketing decisions in its reasonable discretion, including with respect to the design of the Program, product and Value Proposition features, Program Material design, marketing channels, and other details of the Program, subject to Bank&#146;s rights set forth in Section 4.4&#160; and Bank&#146;s rights with respect to any Bank Matter.&#160; Company may from time to time solicit Company Guests to participate in the Program.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company shall offer and fully fund the Value Proposition to Cardholders and be responsible for the design, terms and conditions, and administration of the Value Proposition. Company shall manage and make all decisions with respect to the Value Proposition.&#160; Company may test modifications to the Value Proposition from time to time provided that such tests are designed to avoid any material impact on the Program.&#160; Company may propose changes to the Value Proposition from time to time in accordance with the procedures set forth in Section 3.4 and Section 3.5.&#160; [*]&#160; If Company proposes to make a modification to the Value Proposition, then, unless otherwise agreed by Bank, Company shall deliver all of the following information relating to such proposed modification:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a reasonable description of the proposed modification and Company&#146;s rationale for the proposed modification;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a forecast reflecting the projected effects of the modification on key Program indicators, including credit sales and credit quality and estimated impact to Program profitability of such modification, which forecast shall include reasonably detailed information regarding the factual data and assumptions on which such forecast is based); and</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the results of any testing done with respect to, or other data or analysis supporting, the Value Proposition change.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If a change to the Value Proposition which has been or will be implemented as a Company Matter has or is reasonably expected to have a material adverse effect on the Program, net credit sales, credit risk, or Bank&#146;s economic returns from the Program, based on a written pro forma delivered by Bank to Company, based on reasonable assumptions, then Bank may, by notice to Company, initiate a thirty (30) day negotiation period.&#160; Such thirty (30) day negotiation period may be initiated prior to, and must be initiated no later than [*] following, the implementation of a change to the Value Proposition as a Company Matter.&#160; During such thirty (30) day negotiation period, the parties shall negotiate in good faith changes to the Program </font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">51<a name="PB_51_175703_3641"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='51',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-11.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 17:58 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and/or Program economics that are designed to remedy the effect of the changes to be implemented or the implemented change. [*]</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to Section 2.5(c), Company may, in its reasonable discretion, offer other ancillary benefits or incentives, including Company discounts or special promotions, to Cardholders or Company Guests from time to time.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section 5.2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank Marketing and Analytics Support.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At Company&#146;s option and at no cost to Company, Bank shall provide Company with reasonable access to analysis that is derived from Bank&#146;s analytic tools, market research and marketing support services and shall assist Company in using such information to develop and improve the Program and Company&#146;s business.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At Company&#146;s option and at no cost to Company, Bank shall work with Company, in good faith, to identify marketing opportunities within Bank&#146;s franchise to promote the Program, Company and/or Goods and/or Services, and to offer joint marketing opportunities with Bank&#146;s other non-competing products and services.&#160; The parties shall execute any such marketing campaigns upon terms and conditions mutually agreed upon by the parties.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall, as requested from time to time by Company to promote the Program, improve Program performance, promote Goods and/or Services or otherwise, and at no cost to Company (other than out-of-pocket costs, which shall be expended only at Company&#146;s request), to the fullest extent permitted by Applicable Law and Network Rules and Bank&#146;s or its Affiliates&#146; agreements with third parties, conduct marketing research and provide marketing expertise and support of Company&#146;s marketing efforts based upon the customer databases and customer database analysis tools maintained by or on behalf of Bank and its Affiliates (including their third party servicers), including only Non-Personally Identifiable Information constituting transaction and experience data across Bank&#146;s and its U.S. Affiliates&#146; credit card portfolios.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section 5.3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Communications with Cardholders.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company Inserts</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Subject to Section 4.4 and Applicable Law and Network Rules, Company shall have the exclusive right to communicate with Cardholders, except for any message required by Applicable Law, through use of inserts, fillers and bangtails (collectively, &#147;<u>Inserts</u>&#148;), including Inserts selectively targeted for particular classes of Cardholders, in any or all Billing Statements (including print and electronic Billing Statements).&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, (i) each Insert shall be subject to Bank&#146;s prior review (and shall be provided to Bank at least five (5) Business Days in advance of any mailing) and (ii) any Insert required by Applicable Law or Network Rules shall take precedence over any Company Inserts.&#160; Subject to Section 4.4, Company shall be responsible for the content and &#147;look and feel&#148; of, and the cost of preparing and printing any Inserts, including Inserts required by Applicable Law, subject to Bank&#146;s prior review and approval of the content of Inserts required by Applicable Law and Network Rules.&#160; Bank shall provide Company reasonable advance notice of all Inserts required by Applicable Law or Network Rules to allow Company to coordinate the production, timing and content of all Inserts.&#160; Bank shall not have the right to communicate with Cardholders through the use of Inserts, other than for communications required by Applicable Law or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">52<a name="PB_52_175712_5250"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='52',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-11.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 17:58 2013' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Network Rules&nbsp;or as necessary for Bank to comply with its obligations under this Agreement (including any servicing obligations that Bank assumes pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.14(b)) and as otherwise mutually agreed by the parties in writing.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Billing Statement Messages</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Subject to Section&nbsp;4.4 and Applicable Law and Network Rules, Company shall have the exclusive right to use Billing Statement messages, and Billing Statement envelope messages in any or all Billing Statements (including print and electronic Billing Statements) in each Billing Cycle to communicate with Cardholders, including via Billing Statement messages selectively targeted for particular classes of Cardholders.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, the following messages shall take precedence over any Company messages: (i)&nbsp;any message required by Applicable Law or Network Rules&nbsp;to be communicated to Cardholders to the extent that Bank reasonably determines that the Billing Statement is the best method for making such communications, and (ii)&nbsp;collections and/or Cardholder Service messages.&#160; Subject to Section&nbsp;4.4, Company shall be responsible for preparing the content of all Billing Statement messages, including those required by Applicable Law and Network Rules, subject to Bank&#146;s approval of the content of messages required by Applicable Law or Network Rules.&#160; Bank shall provide Company reasonable advance notice of all messages that are required to comply with Applicable Law Network Rules&nbsp;or collections or Cardholder Service messages in the event Company is performing servicing hereunder to allow Company to coordinate the implementation, timing and content of all statement messages.&#160; Bank shall not have the right to communicate with Cardholders through the use of Billing Statement messages or Billing Statement envelope messages, other than for communications required by Applicable Law or collections or Cardholder Service messages and as otherwise mutually agreed by the parties in writing.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other Communications</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Subject to Section&nbsp;4.4, Applicable Law and any Cardholder opt-out rights, Company shall have the right to communicate with Cardholders, including particular classes of Cardholders, through direct mail (including through catalogs, invitations, newsletters and postcards), e-mail, telephone messaging, text messaging and any other communication channel that Company deems appropriate.&#160; Company may communicate with Cardholders through these channels about any aspect of the Program, including the Value Proposition, and any other subject matter, in Company&#146;s reasonable discretion, subject to Applicable Law.&#160; Company also may use any such communication channels to communicate with Cardholders with respect to any matter required by Applicable Law, and shall do so at Bank&#146;s reasonable request; provided, however, that any communication to Cardholders required by Applicable Law or Network Rules&nbsp;shall be subject to Bank&#146;s approval.&#160; Bank shall not have the right to communicate with Cardholders through the use of such communication channels, other than for communications required by Applicable Law or Network Rules&nbsp;or as necessary for Bank to comply with its obligations under this Agreement (including any servicing obligations that Bank assumes pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.14(b)) and as otherwise mutually agreed by the parties in writing.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Substance of Communications</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Subject to Section&nbsp;2.5, ARTICLE&nbsp;VI and Applicable Law and Network Rules, Company may use the methods of Cardholder communication described in this Section&nbsp;5.3 to promote the Program (including any Enhancement Products), Goods and/or Services, and any other products or services in Company&#146;s reasonable discretion.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, and notwithstanding the</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">53<a name="PB_53_175859_7672"></a></font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='53',FILE='C:\JMS\105733\13-17284-1\task6154890\17284-1-kk-13.htm',USER='105733',CD='Jul 26 20:54 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provisions of this Section&nbsp;5.3, Enhancement Products shall be offered to Cardholders only in accordance with and to the extent permitted by Section&nbsp;5.4, and such Enhancement Products shall not be separately offered by Company through any other means.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Enhancement Products.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall offer credit card enhancement products to Cardholders only as mutually agreed by the parties, including agreement with respect to a compensation arrangement for such additional products (each, an &#147;<u>Enhancement Product</u>&#148;).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;VI</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CARDHOLDER AND CUSTOMER INFORMATION</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Customer Information.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All sharing, use and disclosure of information regarding Applicants, Cardholders and Company Guests shall be subject to the provisions of this </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE&nbsp;VI.&#160; The parties acknowledge that while the same or similar information may be contained in Cardholder Data and Company Guest Data, each such pool of data will be considered separate information subject to the specific provisions applicable to that data hereunder.&#160; By way of example and not limitation:&#160; (i)&nbsp;if a Company Guest receives a Credit Card, Bank may use and disclose the Cardholder Data for all purposes permitted with respect to Cardholder Data hereunder, notwithstanding that the Cardholder originated as a Company Guest; and (ii)&nbsp;if a Cardholder makes a purchase of Goods and/or Services with a Credit Card, Company may use and disclose the Company Guest Data relating to that purchase for all purposes permitted with respect to Company Guest Data hereunder, notwithstanding that such information may also constitute&#160; (or include) Cardholder Data.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each party agrees that any unauthorized use or disclosure of Cardholder Data or Company Guest Data would cause immediate and irreparable harm for which money damages would not constitute an adequate remedy.&#160; In that event, the parties agree that injunctive relief shall be warranted in addition to any other remedies a party may have.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cardholder Data.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As between Bank and Company, Cardholder Data shall be the property of and exclusively owned by Bank.&#160; In its capacity as servicer, Company shall maintain all Cardholder Data and shall provide Bank with full access to Cardholder Data.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The initial privacy notice applicable to the Cardholder Data is attached as <u>Schedule 6.2(b)</u>, which shall be separate from the privacy notice(s)&nbsp;that Bank maintains for its other portfolios.&#160; Bank shall cooperate with Company to provide Company the maximum ability permissible under Applicable Law and Network Rules&nbsp;to use and disclose Cardholder Data, including, as necessary or appropriate, through the Program Privacy Notice and/or the use of disclosures, consents, opt-in provisions or opt-out provisions.&#160; Any modifications to the Program Privacy Notice shall be approved by both parties, provided that the Program Privacy Notice at all times shall (i)&nbsp;comply with Applicable Law and (ii)&nbsp;provide Company access to and the right to</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">54<a name="PB_54_175930_536"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='54',FILE='C:\JMS\105733\13-17284-1\task6154890\17284-1-kk-13.htm',USER='105733',CD='Jul 26 20:54 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">use Cardholder Data to the fullest extent permitted by Applicable Law and Network Rules, including for its business purposes.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall not use, or permit to be used, Cardholder Data, except as provided in this Section&nbsp;6.2.&#160; Bank may use the Cardholder Data and any other information derived from the Cardholder Data in compliance with Applicable Law, the Network Rules&nbsp;and the Program Privacy Notice, solely: (i)&nbsp;as necessary to exercise its rights or carry out its obligations hereunder; (ii)&nbsp;for purposes of promoting the Program or promoting Goods and/or Services available for purchase on an Account at or through any Company Channel; (iii)&nbsp;for purposes of performing analysis and modeling, provided, however, that Cardholder Data used for analysis and modeling other than with respect to the Program shall be Non-Personally Identifiable Information, shall be aggregated with data from other portfolios, and shall not be used in connection with or for the benefit of any co-branded or private label credit program that is or may be offered by Bank on behalf of or in association with any Competing Retailer; or (iv)&nbsp;as necessary or appropriate for purposes of compliance with Applicable Law, regulatory examination, internal auditing functions, risk assessment or management functions, Network Rules&nbsp;or as otherwise set forth in 12 CFR 40.15(a)(1)-(7).&#160; Bank shall not use the Cardholder Data for marketing or any other purposes except as expressly provided herein.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, each party acknowledges that Bank may independently gather information from individuals independent of the Program, including from Persons who may or may not also be Cardholders, and that Bank and its Affiliates may have rights to use and disclose such information independent of whether such information also constitutes Cardholder Data or Company Guest Data under this Agreement; provided, however, except as expressly permitted pursuant to this Agreement, Bank and its Affiliates may not, in any event, take into account that a Person is a Cardholder or intentionally target for solicitation such customers through the use of the Cardholder Data.&#160; Bank shall not commingle Cardholder Data into any Bank marketing database except as provided in this Section&nbsp;6.2(c).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall not disclose, or permit to be disclosed, the Cardholder Data, except as provided in this Section&nbsp;6.2.&#160; Bank may disclose the Cardholder Data in compliance with Applicable Law, the Network Rules, the Program Privacy Notice and the Credit Card Agreement, solely:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to its subcontractors (including Company in its capacity as servicer) in connection with a permitted use of such Cardholder Data under this Section&nbsp;6.2; provided that (A)&nbsp;each such subcontractor is subject to an obligation to maintain the confidential status of Cardholder Data at least as restrictive as that set forth herein, and (B)&nbsp;Bank shall be responsible for the compliance of each such subcontractor (other than Company in its capacity as servicer or any subcontractor of Company in such capacity) with the terms of this Section.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to its Affiliates, and to employees, agents, attorneys, auditors and accountants of Bank and its Affiliates, with a need to know such Cardholder Data in connection with a permitted use of such Cardholder Data under this Section; provided that (A)&nbsp;each such Person is subject to an obligation to maintain the confidential status of Cardholder Data at least as restrictive as that set forth herein, and (B)&nbsp;Bank shall be responsible for the compliance of each such Person with the terms of this Section;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">55<a name="PB_55_175940_5926"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='55',FILE='C:\JMS\105733\13-17284-1\task6154890\17284-1-kk-13.htm',USER='105733',CD='Jul 26 20:54 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to a potential third-party purchaser with respect to any written off Cardholder Indebtedness or otherwise to the extent permitted under this Agreement, or to a trustee in connection with a securitization transaction to the extent permitted under this Agreement; or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to any Governmental Authority asserting authority over Bank or any of its Affiliates (A)&nbsp;in connection with an examination of Bank or any such Affiliate; or (B)&nbsp;pursuant to a specific requirement to provide such Cardholder Data by such Governmental Authority or pursuant to compulsory legal process, provided, however, that Bank shall seek the full protection of confidential treatment for any disclosed Cardholder Data to the extent available under Applicable Law governing such disclosure and with respect to clause (B)&nbsp;Bank shall provide reasonable advance notice to Company to the extent reasonably practicable under the circumstances.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall not, directly or indirectly, sell, or otherwise transfer any right in or to the Cardholder Data, except (i)&nbsp;with respect to any written off Cardholder Indebtedness, (ii)&nbsp;to any potential third-party purchaser to the extent permitted hereunder, and (iii)&nbsp;to a trustee in connection with a securitization transaction related to the Accounts to the extent permitted hereunder, provided that, such trustee shall be bound by a confidentiality agreement affording protections substantially similar to the confidentiality and use provisions of this Agreement with such modifications as may be customary for confidentiality agreements in connection with such securitizations (and any material modifications shall be submitted for approval of Company, which approval shall not be unreasonably delayed, conditioned or withheld).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to Applicable Law, Bank shall provide the information below to Company on a daily basis:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To the extent that Company, as servicer for Bank, has access to the information Bank is obligated to provide under this Section&nbsp;6.2(f), the parties acknowledge and agree that Bank shall be deemed to have fulfilled its obligation hereunder.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company shall not use, or permit to be used, Cardholder Data, except as provided in this Section&nbsp;6.2(g)&nbsp;and subject to the other provisions and procedures of this Agreement, including ARTICLE&nbsp;V and Section&nbsp;3.5.&#160; Company may use the Cardholder Data and any other information derived from the Cardholder Data in compliance with Applicable Law, the Network Rules&nbsp;and the Program Privacy Notice (i)&nbsp;for purposes of promoting the Program or promoting Goods and/or Services available for purchase on an Account at or through any Company Channel, (ii)&nbsp;for all commercially reasonable purposes in the same manner as Company uses Company Guest Data, (iii)&nbsp;as otherwise necessary to carry out its obligations under this Agreement, and (iv)&nbsp;as otherwise permitted by Applicable Law, the Network Rules&nbsp;and the</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">56<a name="PB_56_175950_4688"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='56',FILE='C:\JMS\105733\13-17284-1\task6154890\17284-1-kk-13.htm',USER='105733',CD='Jul 26 20:54 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Program Privacy Notice.&#160; Company shall maintain protocols regarding Cardholder Data intended to ensure that (i)&nbsp;Cardholder Data is logically isolated (and accordingly always separately identifiable)&#160; from Company&#146;s other data and (ii)&nbsp;the use and disclosure of Cardholder Data is limited as provided by Applicable Law and this Agreement.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company shall not disclose, or permit to be disclosed, the Cardholder Data, except as provided in this Section&nbsp;6.2(h).&#160; Company may disclose the Cardholder Data in compliance with Applicable Law, the Network Rules, the Program Privacy Notice and the Credit Card Agreement, solely:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to its subcontractors in connection with a permitted use of such Cardholder Data under this Section&nbsp;6.2; provided that (A)&nbsp;each such subcontractor is subject to an obligation to maintain the confidential status of Cardholder Data at least as restrictive as that set forth herein, and (B)&nbsp;Company shall be responsible for the compliance of each such subcontractor with the terms of this Section;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to its Affiliates, and to employees, agents, attorneys, auditors and accountants of Company or its Affiliates, with a need to know such Cardholder Data in connection with a permitted use of such Cardholder Data under this Section; provided that&nbsp;(A)&nbsp;each such Person is subject to an obligation to maintain the confidential status of Cardholder Data at least as restrictive as that set forth herein, and (B)&nbsp;Company shall be responsible for the compliance of each such Person with the terms of this Section;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to any Governmental Authority asserting authority over Company (A)&nbsp;in connection with an examination of Company; or (B)&nbsp;pursuant to a specific requirement to provide for such Cardholder Data by such Governmental Authority or pursuant to compulsory legal process; provided, however, that Company seeks the full protection of confidential treatment for any such disclosed Cardholder Data to the extent available under Applicable Law governing such disclosure, and with respect to clause (B), Company shall provide reasonable advance notice to Bank to the extent reasonably practicable under the circumstances; or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">as otherwise permitted by Applicable Law, the Program Privacy Notice and the Network Rules&nbsp;(and subject to any other applicable provisions of this Agreement, including ARTICLE&nbsp;V and Section&nbsp;3.5); provided that, for the avoidance of doubt, the parties agree that Company shall not disclose, or permit to be disclosed, any Cardholder Data (or information derived therefrom) to a prospective Nominated Purchaser except at the time, under the circumstances and in accordance with the procedures set forth in Section&nbsp;15.2(h).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">With respect to use and disclosure of Cardholder Data following expiration or termination of this Agreement, the following shall apply:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The rights and obligations of the parties under this Section&nbsp;6.2 shall continue through the Termination Date and, if applicable, the end of the Interim Servicing Period.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Company exercises its rights under Section&nbsp;15.2, Bank shall transfer its right, title and interest in the Cardholder Data to Company or its Nominated Purchaser as part of such transaction, and (subject to Bank&#146;s documentation retention or other obligations under</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Applicable Law) Bank&#146;s right to use and disclose the Cardholder Data shall terminate on the Termination Date.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Company does not exercise its Purchase Option under Section&nbsp;15.2, Company&#146;s right to use and disclose the Cardholder Data shall terminate only to the extent required by Applicable Law.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(j)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The parties shall reasonably cooperate to use, disclose and share Non-Personally Identifiable Information regarding the Program, as mutually agreed upon from time to time to, among other things, monitor Program performance, comply with funding requirements (e.g. rating agency and master trust filing requirements) and support planning and financial reporting processes.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(k)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nothing in this Section&nbsp;6.2 shall restrict Company&#146;s use of Company Guest Data.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company Guest Data.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank acknowledges that Company gathers Company Guest Data and information about prospective purchasers of Goods and/or Services[*] and that Company has rights to use and disclose such Company Guest Data and information independent of whether such information also constitutes Cardholder Data.&#160; Bank shall cooperate in Company gathering and maintenance of Company Guest Data, including by incorporating in the Credit Card Application and Credit Card Agreement mutually agreed provisions pursuant to which Applicants and Cardholders will agree that they are providing their identifying information (including [*]) and all updates thereto to both Bank and Company.&#160; &#160;As between Company and Bank, all Company Guest Data and all information about actual or prospective purchasers of Goods and/or Services gathered by or for Company will be owned exclusively by Company.&#160; Without limiting Bank&#146;s ownership or other rights in respect of the Cardholder Data, Bank acknowledges and agrees that it has no proprietary interest in the Company Guest Data or other information about actual or prospective purchasers of Goods and/or Services gathered by Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall not use, or permit to be used, directly or indirectly, the Company Guest Data except to transfer such data to Company to the extent it is received by Bank and as permitted in this Section&nbsp;6.3.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall not disclose, or permit to be disclosed, the Company Guest Data except as provided in this Section&nbsp;6.3.&#160; Bank may disclose the Company Guest Data in compliance with Applicable Law solely:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to its subcontractors in connection with a permitted use of such Company Guest Data under this Section&nbsp;6.3; provided, however, that (A)&nbsp;each such subcontractor is subject to an obligation to maintain the confidential status of Company Guest Data at least as restrictive as that set forth herein, and (B)&nbsp;Bank shall be responsible for the compliance of each such subcontractor with the terms of this Section;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to its Affiliates and to employees, agents, attorneys, auditors and accountants of Bank or its Affiliates with a need to know such Company Guest Data in connection with a permitted use of such Company Guest Data under this Section&nbsp;6.3; provided,</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">58<a name="PB_58_180013_6228"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='58',FILE='C:\JMS\105733\13-17284-1\task6154890\17284-1-kk-13.htm',USER='105733',CD='Jul 26 20:54 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">however, that (A)&nbsp;each such Person is subject to an obligation to maintain the confidential status of Company Guest Data at least as restrictive as that set forth herein, and (B)&nbsp;Bank shall be responsible for the compliance of each such Person with the terms of this ARTICLE&nbsp;VI; or</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to any Governmental Authority asserting authority over Bank (A)&nbsp;in connection with an examination of Bank or (B)&nbsp;pursuant to a specific requirement to provide such Company Guest Data by such Governmental Authority or pursuant to compulsory legal process; provided, however, that Bank shall seek the full protection of confidential treatment for any disclosed Company Guest Data to the extent available under Applicable Law governing such disclosure; and, with respect to disclosures requested pursuant to clause (B), Bank shall provide reasonable advance notice to Company to the extent reasonably practicable under the circumstances; and to the extent such Company Guest Data is not also Cardholder Data, Bank shall to the extent reasonably practicable under the circumstances seek to redact such Company Guest Data to the fullest extent possible under Applicable Law governing such disclosure.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of the Termination Date, Bank&#146;s rights to use and disclose the Company Guest Data other than as set forth in Section&nbsp;4.15, above, shall terminate.&#160; Promptly following the Termination Date, Bank shall return or destroy all Company Guest Data and shall certify such return or destruction to Company upon request.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cardholder Data Security.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">With respect to the Program, from and after the Effective Date, Company and Bank shall, each at its own cost and expense except to the extent otherwise provided therein, comply with the information security and business continuity requirements set forth in <u>Schedule 6.4</u>.&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At a minimum, the parties shall transmit, store and process Cardholder Data in accordance with Applicable Law, Network Rules, Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards and the then-current security rules&nbsp;and requirements of the Network, all as applicable to the Program.&#160; Company will keep Cardholder Data logically isolated from any data of its own, other customers or suppliers, so that: (i)&nbsp;Cardholder Data is not commingled with third party data or disclosed in conjunction with any disclosure of third party data; and (ii)&nbsp;Company can readily locate and/or return Cardholder Data in accordance with this Agreement.&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Without limiting the foregoing, Company and Bank will each establish, maintain and implement (and require each of its subcontractors receiving Cardholder Data or Company Guest Data to establish, maintain and implement) an information security program, including appropriate administrative, technical and physical safeguards, that is designed to meet the objectives of the Interagency Guidelines Establishing Standards for Safeguarding Information Security Data and any other Applicable Law governing data security, including the objectives of </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)&nbsp;ensuring the security and confidentiality of the Cardholder Data, (w)&nbsp;protecting against any anticipated threats or hazards to the security or integrity of the Cardholder Data, (x)&nbsp;protecting against unauthorized access to or modification, destruction, disclosure, use or disposal of, or access to, Cardholder Data, (y)&nbsp;ensuring the proper disposal of Cardholder Data, and (z)&nbsp;in the event of a security breach involving Cardholder Data, ensuring that the party suffering such breach </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">notifies affected Cardholders, Applicants and other individuals, and Governmental Authorities, in each case insofar as required by and otherwise in compliance with Applicable Law and Network Rules</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, Bank shall have no liability to Company arising out of the failure by Company or any of Company&#146;s subcontractors to comply with the requirements of this Section</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">59<a name="PB_59_180024_6479"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='59',FILE='C:\JMS\105733\13-17284-1\task6154890\17284-1-kk-13.htm',USER='105733',CD='Jul 26 20:54 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.4, which compliance or noncompliance shall be the sole obligation of Company notwithstanding its servicing relationship to Bank.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;VII</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">MERCHANT SERVICES</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Transmittal and Authorization of Charge Transaction Data.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company will accept the Credit Cards for Company Transactions.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company will transmit Charge Transaction Data with respect to Co-Branded Accounts for authorization through the applicable Network system.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company will transmit Charge Transaction Data with respect to Private Label Accounts for authorization in accordance with <u>Schedule 7.1(c)</u>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank, through Company as servicer, shall authorize or decline Transactions on a real time basis, including Transactions involving split-tender (i.e., a portion of the total transaction amount is billed to a Credit Card and the remainder is paid through one or more other forms of payment).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Settlement Procedures.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company Transactions and Network Transactions charged to Co-Branded Accounts will be settled through the applicable Network system.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company Transactions charged to Private Label Accounts will be settled as set forth on <u>Schedule 7.2(b)</u>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Returns of Goods and/or Services.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If a Cardholder purchases Goods and/or Services on an Account and Company processes a return of such Goods and/or Services in accordance with Company return policy or makes another adjustment such as a price reduction, Company shall provide a credit to such Cardholder&#146;s Account.&#160; Company will transmit the relevant information in the Charge Transaction Data for inclusion in the daily settlement process.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interchange; [*].</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">None of Company, its Affiliates or its Licensees shall be required to pay any merchant discount, interchange fees, or other transaction fees to Bank on any Company Transaction charged to a Co-Branded Account.&#160; Bank and Company shall cooperate to obtain approval from the Network to set the interchange fee for Company Transactions charged to a Co-Branded Account to zero; provided, however, if the Network does not approve, Bank shall rebate through the daily settlement process any interchange amounts received by Bank from the Network as a result of the Company Transactions charged to Co-Branded Accounts.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">60<a name="PB_60_180031_2639"></a></font></p>
