<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Retailer that has a Private Label and/or Co-Branded Credit Card with Bank</font></i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; If the Acquired Retailer Portfolio is offered through Bank, the Parties shall discuss in good faith whether: (A)&nbsp;to continue to operate this Program and the Acquired Retailer Portfolio separately under each respective existing program agreement; or (B)&nbsp;integrate the Acquired Retailer Portfolio and this Program as mutually agreed upon by written amendment to the applicable program agreements.&#160; If the parties are unable to reach an agreement within sixty (60) days following the closing of Company&#146;s purchase of such retailer, the parties shall continue to operate this Program and the Acquired Retailer Portfolio separately under each respective existing program agreement.&#160; If the Acquired Retailer Portfolio program agreement terminates before the termination of this Program Agreement, the parties shall have the same rights with respect to such agreement as are set forth in Section&nbsp;12.1(a)(ii)(4).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Other Payment Products</font></i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Neither Bank nor Company shall have any obligation under subsections (i), (ii)&nbsp;or (iii)&nbsp;of this Section&nbsp;12.1(a)&nbsp;with respect to any other payment card product.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Conversion of Purchased Accounts</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; If Bank acquires any Acquired Retailer Portfolio pursuant to Section&nbsp;12.1(a)(i)&nbsp;or Section&nbsp;12.1(a)(ii), or must integrate an Acquired Retailer Portfolio as set forth in Section&nbsp;12.1(a)(iii), Bank shall integrate such Acquired Retailer Portfolio with the Program as follows:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[*]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;12.2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Retail Portfolio Disposition.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nothing in this Agreement shall be deemed to require Company to maintain any Company Channel, in whole or in part, or prevent Company from ceasing to operate any Company Channel, in whole or in part.&#160; In the event Company arranges for the disposition of any separately identifiable group of its retail establishments in the United States, Company may, in its discretion, offer its designated purchaser the right to offer to acquire the portion of the Program Assets related to such disposition (excluding Existing Receivables, except at Bank&#146;s option), [*]. In the event Company does not elect to offer Program Assets related to a disposition to the purchaser in such disposition, or such purchaser in such disposition fails to purchase such Program Assets and there is not a commercially reasonable basis to maintain the Accounts</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">related to the disposition in the Program, Bank may elect within ninety (90) days of such disposition to apply the provisions of Section&nbsp;15.3(c)&nbsp;to such Program Assets.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;XIII</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EVENTS OF DEFAULT; RIGHTS AND REMEDIES</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Events of Default.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The occurrence of any one or more of the following events (regardless of the reason therefor) shall constitute an event of default by a party hereunder:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Such party shall fail to make a payment of any material amount due and payable pursuant to this Agreement (other than payment defaults under Section&nbsp;13.2(a)&nbsp;or Section&nbsp;13.3(a)) that is not disputed in good faith and such failure shall remain unremedied for a period of three (3)&nbsp;Business Days after the non-defaulting party shall have given notice thereof by 5&nbsp;p.m. Eastern.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Such party shall fail to perform, satisfy or comply with any obligation, condition, covenant or other provision contained in this Agreement (other than failure to comply with any service level standard set forth in </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Schedule 4.13(a)</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">, and (i)&nbsp;such failure shall remain unremedied for a period of thirty (30) days after the other party shall have given notice thereof or, if the same cannot be cured in a commercially reasonable manner within such time, the same shall not constitute an event of default if the party shall have initiated and diligently pursued a cure within such time and such cure is completed within sixty (60) days from the date of notice regarding such failure, and (ii)&nbsp;such failure shall or would reasonably be expected to have a material and adverse effect on the Program, Bank Licensed Marks or Company Licensed Marks, or materially diminish the economic value of the Program to the other party.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Any representation or warranty by such party contained in this Agreement shall not be true and correct in any respect as of the date when made or reaffirmed, and (i)&nbsp;the party making such representation or warranty shall fail to cure the event giving rise to such breach within thirty (30) days after the other party shall have given notice thereof specifying the nature of the breach in reasonable detail or, if the same cannot be cured in a commercially reasonable manner within such time, the same shall not constitute an event of default if the party shall have initiated a cure within such time and such cure shall be completed within sixty (60) days from the date of notice regarding such breach, and (ii)&nbsp;such failure shall or would reasonably be expected either to have a material and adverse effect on the Program, Bank Licensed Marks or Company Licensed Marks, or materially diminish the economic value of the Program to the other party.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Defaults by Bank.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The occurrence of any one or more of the following events (regardless of the reason therefore) shall constitute an event of default by Bank:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">82<a name="PB_82_181020_3011"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='82',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-19.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 18:12 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank fails to settle in accordance with Section&nbsp;7.2, any amount that is not disputed in good faith, within two (2)&nbsp;Business Days after Company shall have given notice thereof by 5&nbsp;p.m. Eastern.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall no longer be solvent or shall fail generally to pay its debts as they become due or there shall be a substantial cessation of Bank&#146;s regular course of business.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The OCC or any other regulatory authority having jurisdiction over Bank shall order the appointment of a custodian, receiver, liquidator, assignee, trustee or sequestrator (or similar official) of Bank or of any substantial part of its properties, or order the winding-up or liquidation of the affairs of Bank, and such order shall not be vacated, discharged, stayed or bonded within sixty (60) days from the date of entry thereof.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank shall (i)&nbsp;consent to the institution of proceedings specified in paragraph (c)&nbsp;above or to the appointment of or taking possession by a custodian, receiver, liquidator, assignee, trustee or sequestrator (or similar official) of Bank of any substantial part of its properties, or (ii)&nbsp;take corporate action in furtherance of any such action.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank (i)&nbsp;fails to be adequately capitalized pursuant to capital requirements established from time to time by the OCC; and (ii)&nbsp;fails to correct such capital deficiency within thirty (30) days of the required implementation date for the capital requirement.&#160; Bank shall notify Company in writing promptly (but in any event, within ten (10)&nbsp;Business Days) after the expiry of Bank&#146;s failure to correct its capital deficiency as provided above.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">There shall be any action, claim or any litigation, proceeding, arbitration, investigation or controversy that is adversely determined against Bank or its Affiliates, at law, in equity or otherwise, before any court, board, commission, agency or instrumentality of any federal, state, or local government, or of any agency or subdivision thereof, or before any arbitrator or panel of arbitrators, and such determination is final, non-appealable and has a material and adverse effect on Bank&#146;s ability to perform its obligations under this Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Defaults by Company.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The occurrence of any one or more of the following events (regardless of the reason therefor) shall constitute an event of default by Company:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company fails to settle in accordance with Section&nbsp;7.2 any amount that is not disputed in good faith within </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">two (2)&nbsp;Business Days</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> after Bank shall have given notice thereof by 5&nbsp;p.m. Eastern.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company shall no longer be solvent or shall fail generally to pay its debts as such debts become due or there shall be a substantial cessation of Company&#146;s regular course of business.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A petition under the Bankruptcy Code or similar law shall be filed against Company or any of its Affiliates and not be dismissed within sixty (60) days.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">83<a name="PB_83_181026_9487"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='83',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-19.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 18:12 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A decree or order by a court having jurisdiction (i)&nbsp;for relief in respect of Company pursuant to the Bankruptcy Code or any other applicable bankruptcy or other similar law, (ii)&nbsp;for appointment of a custodian, receiver, liquidator, assignee, trustee, or sequestrator (or similar official) of Company or of any substantial part of its properties, or (iii)&nbsp;ordering the winding-up or liquidation of the affairs of Company shall be entered, and shall not be vacated, discharged, stayed or bonded within sixty (60) days from the date of entry thereof.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company shall (i)&nbsp;file a petition seeking relief pursuant to the Bankruptcy Code or any other applicable bankruptcy or other similar law, (ii)&nbsp;consent to the institution of proceedings pursuant thereto or to the filing of any such petition or to the appointment of or taking possession by a custodian, receiver, liquidator, assignee, trustee or sequestrator (or similar official) of Company or any substantial part of its properties, or (iii)&nbsp;take corporate action in furtherance of any such action.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">There shall be any action, claim or any litigation, proceeding, arbitration, investigation or controversy that is adversely determined against Company or its Affiliates, at law, in equity or otherwise, before any court, board, commission, agency or instrumentality of any federal, state, or local government, or of any agency or subdivision thereof, or before any arbitrator or panel of arbitrators, and such determination is final, non-appealable and has a material and adverse effect on Company&#146;s ability to perform its obligations under this Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;13.4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Remedies for Events of Default.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition to any other rights or remedies available to the parties at law or in equity, upon the occurrence of a Company Event of Default or Bank Event of Default, the non-defaulting party shall be entitled, in addition to its termination rights under ARTICLE&nbsp;XIV, to collect any amount in default plus interest at the Federal Funds Rate and calculated on a three hundred sixty-five (365) day year basis, or such lesser amount permitted under Applicable Law.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon the occurrence of an Event of Default by either party under Section&nbsp;13.1(a), a Bank Event of Default under Section&nbsp;13.2 or a Company Event of Default under Section&nbsp;13.3,&#160; (in any such case, a &#147;<u>Trigger Event</u>&#148;), the non-defaulting party reserves the right at any time thereafter while the Trigger Event remains uncured to establish from amounts payable to the party in default hereunder, and/or require that the party in default establish, a reserve account (&#147;<u>Reserve Account</u>&#148;) or, at the party in default&#146;s option, post a stand-by letter of credit in favor of the non-defaulting party (&#147;<u>LOC</u>&#148;), such Reserve Account to be held by or such LOC to be issued by an institution with a senior unsecured debt rating of at least [*] or its equivalent from at least two of Moody&#146;s, Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s and Fitch Ratings, for the purpose of providing an alternative source of funds for settlement.&#160; If Bank is the party in default, any LOC shall be issued by a financial institution other than Bank or any of its Affiliates and reasonably acceptable to Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The initial amount of the Reserve Account or LOC will be equal to a reasonable estimate of the gross payment obligations of the party in default over the next 30 day period, as determined by the non-defaulting party.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">84<a name="PB_84_181036_9799"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='84',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-19.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 18:12 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The non-defaulting party may adjust the amount of the Reserve Account or LOC to reflect its current estimate of the 30 day payment obligations of the party in default upon three (3)&nbsp;business days&#146; written notice.&#160; At the request of the party in default, no more often than once every thirty (30) days while a Trigger Event is continuing, the non-defaulting party shall reconsider the amount of the Reserve Account or LOC.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The non-defaulting party may, upon three (3)&nbsp;business days&#146; written notice to the party in default, apply funds in the Reserve Account (or draw upon the LOC, as applicable) to satisfy any obligations due from the party in default which the party in default has failed to pay when due as provided in this Agreement and which remain unpaid following notice.&#160; The party in default shall then promptly replenish the alternative funding source.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Funds in the Reserve Account shall remain in the Reserve Account (or the LOC shall remain in effect, as applicable) until either this Agreement has been terminated and the party in default has transmitted all payments as provided herein or the Trigger Event has been cured and has remained cured for at least sixty (60) consecutive days.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;XIV</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TERM/TERMINATION</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;14.1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Term.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Agreement shall continue in full force and effect from the Effective Date until the date which is seven (7)&nbsp;years from the Closing Date (the &#147;<u>Initial Term</u>&#148;) unless earlier terminated as provided herein.&#160; The Agreement shall renew automatically without further action of the parties for successive two (2)&nbsp;year terms (each a &#147;<u>Renewal Term</u>&#148;) unless either party provides written notice of non-renewal at least twelve (12) months prior to the expiration of the Initial Term or current Renewal Term, as the case may be.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;14.2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Termination by Company Prior to the End of the Term.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company may terminate this Agreement after the Closing Date but prior to the end of the Term:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon written notice upon the occurrence of a Bank Event of Default;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon thirty (30) days written notice delivered not more than thirty (30) days after the occurrence thereof if there is (i)&nbsp;a change in control of Bank or a company that directly or indirectly controls Bank, (ii)&nbsp;a merger or consolidation of Bank and Bank is not the surviving entity, (iii)&nbsp;a sale of all or substantially all of the assets of Bank or (iv)&nbsp;a sale, transfer, conveyance or assignment of Bank&#146;s credit card business or any portion thereof that includes the Accounts; provided, however, that a purely internal corporate reorganization or restructuring shall not be deemed a change in control so long as Bank or any resulting entity that is an issuer under the Program (x)&nbsp;is a national bank and (y)&nbsp;satisfies the requirements for assignment to an Affiliate pursuant to Section&nbsp;17.3;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">85<a name="PB_85_181043_4015"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='85',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-19.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 18:12 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon thirty (30) days written notice if (i)&nbsp;any Change in Applicable Law materially impairs Company&#146;s ability to use Cardholder Data for its business purposes, beyond its role as servicer for the Program, and (ii)&nbsp;the effects after giving effect to such Change in Applicable Law would be materially lessened if Company and its Affiliates operated the Program themselves and/or with a Person other than Bank; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that prior to delivering a notice of termination pursuant to this Section&nbsp;14.2(f), (x)&nbsp;Company shall engage in good faith negotiations with Bank for a period of not less than thirty (30) days in an effort to modify the Program in a way that would preserve at least the same level of access and use of such data for the benefit of Company following the relevant Change in Applicable Law as was permitted prior to the date of this Agreement and if such access is preserved Company shall have no such right to deliver a notice of termination pursuant to this Section&nbsp;14.2(f)&nbsp;and (y)&nbsp;in order to deliver a notice of termination pursuant to this Section&nbsp;14.2(f), Company shall provide written notice of its election to commence negotiations pursuant to this Section&nbsp;not later than ninety (90) days after the effective date of such Change in Applicable Law;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon thirty (30) days written notice if (i)&nbsp;any Change in Applicable Law materially impairs Company&#146;s ability to act as servicer for the Program as provided herein (it being understood and agreed that an increase in costs shall not be deemed to materially impair Company&#146;s ability to act as servicer for purposes of this Section&nbsp;14.2(d)) and (ii)&nbsp;the effects after giving effect to such Change in Applicable Law would be materially lessened if Company and its Affiliates operated the Program themselves and/or with a Person other than Bank; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that prior to delivering a notice of termination pursuant to this Section&nbsp;14.2(d),(x)&nbsp;Company shall engage in good faith negotiations with Bank for a period of not less than thirty (30) days in an effort to modify the Program in a way that would preserve at least the same level of ability to act as servicer following the relevant Change in Applicable Law as was permitted prior to the date of this Agreement and if such ability is preserved Company shall have no such right to deliver a notice of termination pursuant to this Section&nbsp;14.2(d)&nbsp;and (y)&nbsp;in order to deliver a notice of termination pursuant to this Section&nbsp;14.2(d), Company shall provide written notice of its election to commence negotiations pursuant to this Section&nbsp;not later than ninety (90) days after the effective date of such Change in Applicable Law;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.5(d);</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.14(c);</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon written notice if neither Bank Guarantor nor Bank has a senior unsecured debt rating of at least [*] or its equivalent from at least two of Moody&#146;s, Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s and Fitch Ratings, provided that Company shall have no right to deliver a notice of termination pursuant to this Section&nbsp;14.2(g)&nbsp;to the extent Bank establishes and maintains a Reserve Account or posts a LOC as provided by Section&nbsp;13.4(b)&nbsp;hereof, and in such case Company shall have the rights and obligations of a non-defaulting party under Section&nbsp;13.4(b)&nbsp;and Bank shall have the rights and obligations of a defaulting party under Section&nbsp;13.4(b); or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon written notice if Bank shall fail to perform, satisfy or comply with any obligation, condition, covenant or other provision contained in this Agreement for a period of not less than sixty (60) consecutive days due to a Force Majeure Event and such failure shall either</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">86<a name="PB_86_181050_2784"></a></font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='86',FILE='C:\JMS\105590\13-17284-1\task6154441\17284-1-kk-19.htm',USER='105590',CD='Jul 26 18:12 2013' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">have a material and adverse effect on the Program, the Bank Licensed Marks or the Company Licensed Marks, or materially diminish the economic value of the Program to Company.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;14.3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Termination by Bank Prior to the End of the Term.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank may terminate this Agreement after the Closing Date but prior to the end of the Term:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon notice upon the occurrence of a Company Event of Default;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">in accordance with Section&nbsp;[*];</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon thirty (30) days notice if a Change in Applicable Law results in a reduction in Alternative Risk-Adjusted Revenue as provided in <u>Schedule 14.3(c)</u>;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon written notice if Target Corporation does not have a senior unsecured debt rating of at least [*] or its equivalent from at least two of Moody&#146;s, Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s and Fitch Ratings, provided that Bank shall have no such right to deliver a notice of termination pursuant to this Section&nbsp;14.3(d)&nbsp; to the extent Company establishes and maintains a Reserve Account or posts a LOC as provided by Section&nbsp;13.4(b)&nbsp;hereof, and in such case Bank shall have the rights and obligations of a non-defaulting party under Section&nbsp;13.4(b)&nbsp;and Company shall have the rights and obligations of a defaulting party under Section&nbsp;13.4(b); or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">upon notice if Company shall fail to perform, satisfy or comply with any obligation, condition, covenant or other provision contained in this Agreement for a period of not less than sixty (60) consecutive days due to a Force Majeure Event and such failure shall either have a material and adverse effect on the Program, the Bank Licensed Marks or the Company Licensed Marks, or materially diminish the economic value of the Program to Bank.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;14.4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Termination Prior to Closing Date.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Agreement shall terminate automatically if the Purchase Agreement terminates prior to the Closing Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company may terminate this Agreement upon notice to Bank on or prior to the Closing Date if a Bank Event of Default shall have occurred.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank may terminate this Agreement upon notice to Company on or prior to the Closing Date if a Company Event of Default shall have occurred.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">87<a name="PB_87_181058_1605"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;XV</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EFFECTS OF TERMINATION</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">General Effects.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event of termination prior to the Closing Date, all obligations of the parties under this Agreement shall cease, except that the provisions specified in Section&nbsp;17.22 shall survive.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event of termination following the Closing Date, all obligations of the parties inc</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">luding (i)&nbsp;operating the Program and servicing of the Accounts in good faith and in the ordinary course of their respective businesses, (ii)&nbsp;compensation as set forth in </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE&nbsp;VIII, (iii)&nbsp;originating and extending credit on Accounts and funding Cardholder Indebtedness, (iv)&nbsp;solicitations, marketing and advertising of the Program,&#160; (v)&nbsp;acceptance of Credit Card Applications through Company Channels in the ordinary course of business consistent with past practice and (vi)&nbsp;acceptance of Credit Cards for payment by Company and its Affiliates in accordance with this Agreement, shall continue upon notice of termination or non-renewal of this Agreement by either party, except as the parties may mutually agree, subject to the terms of this Agreement, until the provisions of Section&nbsp;15.2 and Section&nbsp;15.3 are satisfied; provided, however, that Company may, at its option, upon notice to Bank, stop accepting Credit Card Applications, stop accepting Credit Cards as a form of payment in Company Channels, and/or stop marketing of the Program if Bank has breached its obligation to settle undisputed Company Transactions and has not cured such breach within two (2)&nbsp;Business Days of receipt of notice from Company of such breach; provided, further, that Company shall commence such acceptance once such breach has been cured.&#160; The parties will cooperate in good faith to ensure the orderly wind-down or transfer of the Program, including the servicing thereof,&#160; in a manner that minimizes any adverse effect on the Program, Cardholders and Bank.&#160; Each party shall pay its out-of-pocket costs and expenses associated with the wind-down or transfer of the Program.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event that Bank performs any of the servicing functions for the Program as of a Program Purchase Date (as defined below), Bank shall, upon request of Company or the Nominated Purchaser, continue to provide interim servicing for a period of up to [*] (&#147;<u>Bank Interim Servicing Period</u>&#148;) from and after such date on the same terms and conditions as existed on the Program Purchase Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon the satisfaction of the provisions of Section&nbsp;15.2 and Section&nbsp;15.3, all obligations of the parties under this Agreement shall cease, except that the provisions specified in Section&nbsp;17.22 shall survive.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company Option to Purchase the Program Assets.</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If this Agreement expires or is terminated by either party for whatever reason, except for termination under Section&nbsp;14.4 and except as set forth in Section&nbsp;15.2(d), Company has the option to purchase (or to arrange for one or more third parties nominated by Company (a &#147;<u>Nominated Purchaser</u>&#148;) to purchase) from Bank the Program Assets, including all relevant Account Documentation, Account information and history and other data reasonably necessary</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">88<a name="PB_88_181250_1629"></a></font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to enable continuing operation and management of the Accounts (the &#147;<u>Purchase Option</u>&#148;), at the purchase price set forth in Section&nbsp;15.2(d), Section&nbsp;15.2(e)&nbsp;or Section&nbsp;15.2(f), as applicable, and on customary terms and conditions (and no more onerous to (i)&nbsp;Bank than those applicable to Company in the Purchase Agreement or (ii)&nbsp;Company or the Nominated Purchaser than those applicable to Bank in the Purchase Agreement).</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Purchase Option is exercisable by Company or a Nominated Purchaser serving notice (the &#147;<u>Purchase Notice</u>&#148;) by the later of: (i)&nbsp;[*] prior to expiration of the Term pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.1&nbsp;(or [*] after notice of termination pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.2 or Section&nbsp;14.3, if applicable) or (ii)&nbsp;[*] after Company receives the information required to be provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;15.2(h).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If such Purchase Option is exercised, Company or a Nominated Purchaser must complete the purchase of the Program Assets within [*] after delivery of the Purchase Notice; provided, however, that consummation of the purchase of the Program Assets shall occur no earlier than the Termination Date; provided, further, that the [*] timeframe may be extended up to [*] after delivery of the Purchase Notice for required regulatory approvals.&#160; The date of such completion shall be the &#147;<u>Program Purchase Date</u>.&#148;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If this Agreement is terminated by Company in accordance with Section&nbsp;14.2(f), Company&#146;s Purchase Option shall be for the Program Assets excluding the Existing Receivables.&#160; The purchase price for such Program Assets, excluding the Existing Receivables, payable on the Program Purchase Date, shall be equal to par value as of the Program Purchase Date of the Cardholder Indebtedness being purchased that has not been written off in accordance with the Risk Management Policies.&#160; If Company exercises such Purchase Option for the Program Assets excluding the Existing Receivables, Bank shall have the right, at its option, to require Company to purchase the Existing Receivables for a purchase price equal to par value as of the Program Purchase Date of the Existing Receivables that have not been written off in accordance with the Risk Management Policies.&#160; If Bank does not elect to require Company to purchase the Existing Receivables, (i)&nbsp;Bank shall own such Existing Receivables and Company shall continue to service such Existing Receivables under the financial terms set forth in ARTICLE&nbsp;VIII and <u>Schedule 8.1</u>, and (ii)&nbsp;Company shall have the right, as of a purchase date to be mutually agreed upon by the parties, to purchase pursuant to and exercisable only upon a Clean Up Call Option, for a purchase price equal to fair market value as determined in accordance with Section&nbsp;15.2(g), the remainder of the Existing Receivables that have not been written off in accordance with the Risk Management Policies. Company shall maintain books and records sufficient to identify the Existing Receivables.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If this Agreement is terminated by either party in accordance with Section&nbsp;14.2 or Section&nbsp;14.3, excluding Section&nbsp;14.2(f), the purchase price for the Program Assets purchased, payable on the Program Purchase Date, shall be equal to par value as of the Program Purchase Date of the Cardholder Indebtedness that has not been written off in accordance with the Risk Management Policies.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If this Agreement terminates in accordance with Section&nbsp;14.1, the purchase price for the Program Assets purchased, payable on the Program Purchase Date, shall be equal to:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">par value as of the Program Purchase Date of the Cardholder Indebtedness that did not exist as of the Closing Date and that has not been written off in accordance with the Risk Management Policies; and</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">fair market value, as determined in accordance with Section&nbsp;15.2(g), as of the Program Purchase Date of the remainder of the Existing Receivables that have not been written off in accordance with the Risk Management Policies, exercisable only pursuant to the terms of a Clean Up Call Option.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon receipt of the Purchase Notice, if applicable, the parties shall enter into good faith negotiations to determine the fair market value of the Existing Receivables for a period of thirty (30) days.&#160; In the event that the parties do not reach agreement on the fair market value of the Existing Receivables during such period, Bank and Company shall each retain an Independent Appraiser who together shall select a third Independent Appraiser.&#160; Bank and Company shall each pay fifty percent (50%) of the costs associated with the third Independent Appraiser.&#160; The parties shall provide such information to the Independent Appraisers as is necessary to permit each of the Independent Appraisers to provide a valuation of the Existing Receivables; provided, however, that the information provided to both Independent Appraisers shall be identical.&#160; Such appraisals shall be performed on the basis of the assumptions set forth in </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Schedule 15.2(g)</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; The fair market value shall be the average of the two (2)&nbsp;closest valuations received from the Independent Appraisers; provided, however, if the median valuation is equal to the mean of the three (3)&nbsp;valuations, the fair market value shall be such median/mean value.&#160; The fair market value determined in accordance with this Section&nbsp;15.2(g)&nbsp;shall be final and binding on the parties and enforceable in any court having jurisdiction. None of the Independent Appraisers can be compensated based on the outcome of their appraisal or the outcome of the fair market value process.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The parties will use commercially reasonable efforts to minimize transition costs.&#160; Following the provision by either party of notice of termination or non-renewal of this Agreement or the occurrence of an event that gives rise to a right of termination, or at any time during the [*] period preceding the expiration of the Term, promptly upon Company&#146;s request (but in no event later [*] after such request), Bank shall provide (i)&nbsp;Company with Program-related data (and subject to this Section&nbsp;15.2(h), Company is hereby authorized to use data in its possession, in its capacity as servicer or otherwise) of the type that is both permitted to be disclosed by Applicable Law and typically included in a request for proposal process to allow Company, its advisors and potential bidders to value the Program Assets and provide a comprehensive bid, and (ii)&nbsp;Company and its prospective or actual Nominated Purchasers (and Company, as servicer may provide prospective or actual Nominated Purchasers upon prior notice to Bank) access to the books and records relating to the Program Assets and the performance of the Program, including (to the extent permitted by Applicable Law) Account-level data typically accessed in such a process, for the purpose of conducting due diligence investigations to determine whether they wish to purchase the Program Assets; provided, however, that Company and any prospective or actual Nominated Purchaser shall enter into confidentiality arrangements for the benefit of Bank that require the prospective or actual Nominated Purchaser to maintain the confidentiality of such information to the same extent required by this Agreement and not to use the information for any purpose other than the evaluation of whether to make an offer to purchase the Program Assets before providing such data access.&#160; During this period, Bank shall</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:5.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">[*] Indicates confidential portions omitted pursuant to a request for confidential treatment filed separately with the Commission.</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
